title: The garage shall be set-back behind the building line for a street or road on which the plot abuts and shall not be located affecting the access ways to the building
clause_text: The garage shall be set-back behind the building line for a street or road on which the plot abuts and shall not be located affecting the access ways to the building.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
